article: One day, a farmer's donkey fell into a dried up well. The animal cried   _   for hours as the farmer tried to   think out   what to do. Finally, he decided that the animal was   _  , the well needed to be covered up, and   _   the donkey just wasn't worth the 20 _ , so he invited his neighbors to 21 come over  and help him bury the donkey in the well. They all held shovels   and begin to shovel 22 _  into the well. At first, the donkey 23 _  what was happing and 24 _  cried pitifully. Then, to everyone's 25 _ , he quieted down. A few shovel loads later, the farmer finally looked 26 _  into the well and was 27 _  at what he saw.   _   each shovel load of dirt that hit his back, the donkey 29 _  something surprising. He shook it off and took a step up! As the farmer's neighbors30 _  to shovel dirt 31 on top of  the animal, he would shake it off and take a step up. The donkey stepped 32 _  over the edge of the well! As with the donkey,   _   is going to shovel dirt 34 _  you, all kinds of dirt. We can get out of the deepest wells just by not stopping, by never giving35 _ .
